long_description: The Burley Handlebar Console provides compartmentalized space for any Burley trailer being used for jogging or strolling. Includes space for water bottle or coffee, wallet and keys, 2 slots for iPod/cell phone, a pen holder and a zippered pocket that holds a shopping bag. Fits all 2012 and prior year Burley single and double trailer models.
short_description: The Burley Handlebar Console provides compartmentalized space for any Burley trailer being used for jogging or strolling.
